      Helper method for Query 1 This method finds the number of attended Lessons - meaning PAST lessons this customer registered to
      java.util.Set<Lesson> Subscription.getLessons()

      Methods in core with parameters of type Lesson 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Subscription.addLesson(Lesson lessonToAdd)
      This method adds a lesson to the subscription's lessons set IF its new for this subscription
      boolean Customer.addLesson(Lesson lessonToAdd)
      This method adds a lesson to the lessons ArrayList of the customer IF he has a valid subscription
      boolean Coach.addLesson(Lesson lesson)
      This method add a lesson to this coach lessons IF he is available at the time.
      boolean Room.addLessons(Lesson les)
      This method adds a new lesson in to the lessons array of the room only IF the room type matches (not GYM) and the time slot is free
      boolean Subscription.cancelLesson(Lesson lessonToCancel)
      This method delete a lesson from the lessons set of this subscription
      boolean Customer.cancleLesson(Lesson lessonToCancel)
      this method checks if the customer has a subscription that is registered to the given lesson if so, delete it from the subscription lessons
      boolean Room.removeLesson(Lesson lesson)
      This method removes a lesson if it exist & belongs to this room
      boolean Coach.removeLesson(Lesson lesson)
      This method removes a lesson if it exist & belongs to this coach
